Summary: A black ball ascended then went lateral almost directly overhead
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to the near by Burger King like always I look to the sky to see what if any thing is moveing I am an amature astonomer and often look for sattalites and UFO's this is my fourth or fifth sighting O K back to what I saw I was looking around and spotted what I thought was a balloon riseing from the near by school toward the west it was twilight and i could see the out line black round ball this caught my attention still thinking it was a ballon I kept looking at it,it seemed to reach about 200 feet high then it started to move in my direction from the west to the east still watching, it gained speed and came toward me still at 200 feet this was coming almost directly in my direction as it flew almost right overhead all I could see a round black ball but I did see a very slight white light outline on the upper part kind of like a crescent moon but there where no lights for a reflection from above it went out of my sight for a second or two as the building blocked my view I ran around the corner to see where it should be but is was gone my guess it was travling at about 80 to 100 mph,size wise it seemed to a bigger than a basket ball 24 to 30 inches , I hope this helps
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There were no other sightings in Huntington Beach on or around May 29th 2011
